title: How FI-MEN, a technology, is helping in mobilising finance for EVs in India - Hindustan Times

description: This article is authored by Ashok Mittal, CEO, Prest Loans, Brajendra, CEO, Finayo, Bakesh, COO, Yogesh CAO, Kamal CTO, Sanjay Mentor.
